content:
Congratulations to your best friend on her special day! I'm happy to help you plan a romantic getaway with your boyfriend.

However, I need a bit more information to give you personalized recommendations. You mentioned a vineyard where you attended your coworker's wedding, but I don't have any specific details about the location. Could you please provide me with the name of the vineyard or the city/state where it's located? That way, I can suggest some romantic bed and breakfasts in the area.

Additionally, what type of atmosphere are you looking for in a B&B? Do you prefer a cozy and intimate setting, a luxurious and modern vibe, or something with a historic charm?

Once I have more information, I'd be delighted to help you plan a romantic weekend getaway with your boyfriend!
